feature(feature)¶

Returns an integer or real number representing the queried feature variable.

Parameters:feature – Name of the feature.
isGenre(genre)¶
vector(features=[])¶

Returns a feature vector of this song’s features. :param tags: List of tags to include as binary features. :return: Vector of features.

close()¶
generate_split(train, validate, test, total=147000)¶

Generates a train/validate/test split of the data. :param train: [0,1] portion used for training :param validate: [0,1] portion used for validate :param test: [0,1] portion used for test :param total: total number of examples used from all 3. :return: None

Generates a list of songs with both full features and lyrics and saves to a target file. :return: None

get_bow_by_msd(track_id)¶

Returns the BOW for a given MSD track ID, or an array of 0 counts if no track with the given ID is found in the database.. :param track_id: :return:

get_bow_by_msd_batch(track_ids)¶
get_songs_with_lyrics()¶

Returns a list of all songs in the lyric database by MSD track ID.

Data.msd.correlated_features(data, target_feature, k)¶

Given a tag, returns the k most highly correlated features with that tag over the input.

Parameters:
  • data – Input data in form of nparray of MSFeatures objects.
  • feature – String of feature to match.
  • k – Number of results.
Returns:

String names of k most highly correlated features.
Data.msd.load_tags()¶

Loads music brainz tags from specified tag file and returns them as a list.
